title: Jan Stephenson's How to Golf
brief_description: How to Golf is a 50 minute cassette that addresses each and every aspect of the game of golf, from driving off the tee to effective hazard play. Each segment is colour coded for easy referral to the areas of your game that need work most. Suitable for male and female golf enthusiasts of all ages and abilities, starring one of the most recognisable sports personalities world-wide - Jan Stephenson.
